author: jrl7777
title: Quick new York trip
text: What a beautiful hotel! The receptionist, Mohammad is more than accommodating. When I asked about early check in he was happy to not only obliged and wave the early check in fee, but also upgraded our room with an extra bed on the high rise as we had an unexpected traveler join our group. The location could not be more perfect!! HIGHLY recommended the manhattan hotel â™¡
